overview.zh: 东信集团将与各大 4S 店系统、汽车之家、各大汽车媒体和汽车生产厂家等联合，将代币参与到汽车商家的各种优惠活动中，比如购买者可以通过积分兑换、购买赠送等方式来获得代币。代币也可以直接参与汽车后市场用品交易、养车修车、车险等汽车服务中，促使代币的流通属性更高，实现先落地后发行
overview.en: Eastern Trust group will union 4S store system、autohome、car media and car  manufacturers to use the ETRC1 into promotion.Customer can get ETRC1 by exchanging points or buying gifts and so on.The ETRC1 can also direct participation in post market commodity trading、car maintenance or  car insurance that will make the circulation of the ETRC1 higher and landing first.
